thread.title: Andy

author: Andy
title: Andy
text: I am very happy with my new Tom Ford sunglasses !! Thank to the delivery speed, I receive them on time even they were out of stock when just ordered ! Girls support had always informed me, provide me with suggestions if my order was urgent (choose another pair, etc.) and at the end, I've got mine, perfectly packed !! Thanks for you excellent service, it was my 5th order with Otticanet and I'll continue with you !
